title: Emmyflac
author: Emmyflac
content: WHITE PAPERSHIBA BLASTARMy name is Nagahyko and I come down from the mountains of Nagano to provide all people with the opportunity to achieve their dreams.My faithful companion is a shiba inu whom I call Blastar, he is a faithful and very playful dog. I love to dress him up, make him wear hats, glasses but also put him in pants. It's so much fun .With shiba Blastar I traveled the whole world and met many people. We played the adventurers and discovered that you have to believe in your dreams to achieve great things. As soon as I got back from this extraordinary trip with my shiba blastar, I decided to write these few lines.A message to transmit my heritage and allow build a sharing community that promotes personal enrichment. To show the whole world that with nothing and by coming together we can improve our way of life and achieve great things.Building a community capable of being self-sufficient to create wealth out of nothing.Building the shiba Blastar community around a useful and sharing token project. A token that gives power to the people and allows everyone to live better by increasing their purchasing power.You are the shiba Blastar people!  The people capable of coming together to win!The people who show that the memes coins can be useful.We will allow each person who uses shibablastar to increase their standard of living and contribute to their personal enrichment.Come together to create the first spontaneous community building experience, of decentralized cryptocurrency promoting increased purchasing power.I leave you the best of myself to achieve this.Lets go !STEP 1Creation of the shibaBlastar currency on ethereum.The number of units created is 500,000,000,000 shibaBlastar with 18 decimal.Distribution of the ShibaBlastar token   40% is blocked to be shared with the 10,000 NFTs bearing the effigy of the shiba Blastar that will be put up for sale.   30% is locked in a Uniswap pool and the keys burned.   20% is blocked to allow mining of the Shiba Blastar cryptocurrency from the launch of the platform.   10% is blocked to reward NFT holders who will participate in the evolution and securing of the project by voting system.STEP 2Creation and sale of 10,000 NFTs bearing the image of my shiba Blastar on the https://www.shibablastar.org platform. Each nft is tied to an amount of 20,000,000 shibaBlastar token. NFTs are sold to allow ensure the stability of the currency  and prevent a small group of people from holding a large number of tokens. NFT Shibablastar   Each nft is attached to 20,000,000 shiba Blastar which can only be recovered when the               10,000 nfts are sold. The holders of the nft will have the status of "Blastar" and will have the               possibility of participating in the evolution of the project by voting system. They will also                  secure the shibablastar.org platform by validating buy/sales transactions. They will receive               of shibablastar tokens as a reward.   The first 3000 Nfts will be sold for a symbolic 1 dollar per unit (NFT representing shibablastar coin )   The other 7000 Nfts will be sold at a fixed price of 0.35 ethereum per unit (NFT representing the shibablastar in disguise)Distribution of gains generated by the sale of 10,000 nfts   30% of the winnings will be used to organize a contest to elect the most beautiful shibablastar (NFT).    30% of the earnings will be used for the creation and launch of the ShibaBlastar platform.   30% of earnings will be used to add items to the shibaBlastar platform.   10% of the winnings will be donated to associations in favor of the shiba inu.STEP 31.   Release the 40% of shibaBlastar to share with the holders of the 10,000 NFTs.        Each Nft owner will receive 20 million shibaBlastar. 2.   Organization of the contest to elect the most beautiful shibablastar. This contest will be reserved only for 7000 nfts representing the shibablastar in disguise.STEP 4Result of the contest for the most beautiful shibablastar and distribution of gifts.STEP 5Creation of the shibablastar.org platform to make the token useful .Addition of goods on the platform for the equivalent of 30% of the earnings generated by the sale of the 10,000 NFTs ( (mobile phone, multimedia products, electric car, … )Utility of the platform and the shibablastar token :   Allow the community to exchange products or services between members for shibaBlastar tokens. A secure system guaranteeing transactions will be available.   Allow the community to increase its purchasing power by taking advantage of the redistribution of earnings generated by the sale of advertising space on the platform. 80% of advertising earnings will be used to put products online on the platform that can be purchased for a few shibaBlastar (mobile phone, computers, clothes, etc.). "Discount price" operations will be created each month to allow reductions of up to 90% on items on the platform.   Allow the community to mine shibablastar by participating in the activity of the platform ( check ads, validate sponsors, organize “discount price” operations … )   Allow holders of NFTs (Blastar status) to participate in the development of the project by voting system and to secure the purchase/sale transactions of the platform. As a reward they will receive shibablastar tokens.   Allow the valorization of the shibablastar token by guaranteeing a real value by the possibility of exchanging the shibablastar token against an item at any time.   Allow the community to guarantee the decentralization of the shibablastar token.   Allow the community to invest 10% of the earnings generated by advertising spaces in projects in favour of the shiba inu (association)   Allow to decrease the total number of shibablastar tokens with a burning system.10% of the shibablastar tokens earned with the sale of advertising space are burned.STEP 6Launch of the https://www.shibablastar.org platform to enable the shibablastar community to increase its purchasing power.STEP 7Increase in the value of the shibaBlastar token with the implementation of an automatic burning system:Installation of buy/sell transaction fees on the platform (equivalent to 1.5% of the value of the item).Automatic burning of shibablastar tokens that have been received for buy/sell transaction fees.The final objective will be to reach the symbolic bar of 1 dollar for a shibaBlastar token.Don't forget, you are the shibablastar community who works for the common good and the sharing of wealth.Nagahyko
